first-ngtags-app.title: First ngtags App
first-ngtags-app.preview: [Ngtags](http://ngtags.org) objective is to simplify the creation of [AngularJS](https://angularjs.org) apps. Instead of creating complex _directive_ and _routes_ structure definitions it allows to create them through an `html` like tags self explained and contained. Say hello:  ```html <angular-element name="say-hello">     <template>         <h1

grunt-frontmatter.title: grunt-frontmatter: extracting yaml
grunt-frontmatter.preview: Here I present a new grunt task (yep, another grunt task), the idea of these task is to extract YAML front-matter from files and put them all into one single JSON file.
